00036 #include <stdio.h>

00038 // endianess test
00039 static int endiantest = 1;
00040 #define LITTLE_ENDIAN_P (*(char*)&endiantest)
00041 
00042 using namespace std;

00046 // template functions returning the magic number associated with a particular type
00047 template<class T>       inline int get_magic() { ylerror("matrix type not implemented."); return 0; }
00048 template<>                              inline int get_magic<ubyte>()   { return MAGIC_BYTE_MATRIX; }
00049 template<>                      inline int get_magic<int>()             { return MAGIC_INTEGER_MATRIX; }
00050 template<>                      inline int get_magic<float>()   { return MAGIC_FLOAT_MATRIX; }
00051 template<>                              inline int get_magic<double>()  { return MAGIC_DOUBLE_MATRIX; }
00052 template<>                              inline int get_magic<long>()    { return MAGIC_LONG_MATRIX; }
00053 template<class T>       inline int get_magic_vincent() { ylerror("matrix type not implemented."); return 0; }
00054 template<>                              inline int get_magic_vincent<ubyte>()   { return MAGIC_UBYTE_VINCENT; }
00055 template<>                      inline int get_magic_vincent<int>()             { return MAGIC_INT_VINCENT; }
00056 template<>                      inline int get_magic_vincent<float>()   { return MAGIC_FLOAT_VINCENT; }
00057 template<>                              inline int get_magic_vincent<double>()  { return MAGIC_DOUBLE_VINCENT; }
00058 template<>                              inline int get_magic_vincent<long>()    { return 0x0000; }
00059 
00060 // type to string function for debug message.
00061 inline string get_magic_str(int magic) {
00062         switch (magic) {
00063         // standard format
00064         case MAGIC_BYTE_MATRIX:                 return "ubyte";
00065         case MAGIC_INTEGER_MATRIX:      return "int";
00066         case MAGIC_FLOAT_MATRIX:                return "float";
00067         case MAGIC_DOUBLE_MATRIX:       return "double";
00068         case MAGIC_LONG_MATRIX:                 return "long";
00069         // pascal vincent format
00070         case MAGIC_UBYTE_VINCENT:       return "ubyte (pascal vincent)";
00071         case MAGIC_INT_VINCENT:                 return "int (pascal vincent)";
00072         case MAGIC_FLOAT_VINCENT:       return "float (pascal vincent)";
00073         case MAGIC_DOUBLE_VINCENT:      return "double (pascal vincent)";
00074         default: return "unknown type";
00075         }
00076 }
00077 
00087 template<class T> inline void reverse_n(T *ptr, int n) {
00088         char *mptr = (char *) ptr;
00089         while(n--)
00090         {
00091                 char tmp;
00092                 char *uptr = mptr + sizeof (T);
00093                 if (sizeof (T) >= 2)
00094                 { tmp = mptr[0]; mptr[0]=uptr[-1]; uptr[-1]=tmp; }
00095                 if (sizeof (T) >= 4)
00096                 { tmp = mptr[1]; mptr[1]=uptr[-2]; uptr[-2]=tmp; }
00097                 if (sizeof (T) >= 6)
00098                 { tmp = mptr[2]; mptr[2]=uptr[-3]; uptr[-3]=tmp; }
00099                 if (sizeof (T) >= 8)
00100                 { tmp = mptr[3]; mptr[3]=uptr[-4]; uptr[-4]=tmp; }
00101                 mptr = uptr;
00102         }
00103 }
00104 
00105 template<class T> inline T endian(T ptr) {
00106         T v = ptr;
00107         if (LITTLE_ENDIAN_P) reverse_n(&v, 1);
00108         return v;
00109 }

00111 // TODO: use c++ IO to catch IO exceptions more easily
00112 // TODO: if types differ, print warning and cast to expected type
00113 template<typename T> bool load_matrix(Idx<T>& m, const char *filename) {
00114         // open file
00115         FILE *fp = fopen(filename, "rb");
00116         if (!fp) {
00117                 cerr << "load_matrix failed to open " << filename << "." << endl;
00118                 return false;
00119         }
00120 
00121         int magic, ndim, v;
00122         int ndim_min = 3; // the standard header requires at least 3 dimensions even empty ones.
00123         intg *dims = NULL;
00124 
00125         // header: read magic number
00126         fread(&magic, sizeof (int), 1, fp);
00127         int magic_vincent = endian(magic);
00128         ndim = endian(magic) & 0xF;
00129         magic_vincent &= ~0xF;
00130         if ((magic != get_magic<T>()) && (magic_vincent != get_magic_vincent<T>())) {
00131                 cerr << "load_matrix failed (" << filename << "): ";
00132                 cerr << get_magic_str(get_magic<T>()) << " expected, ";
00133                 cerr << get_magic_str(magic) << " found." << endl;
00134                 return false;
00135         }
00136         // standard header
00137         if (magic == get_magic<T>()) {
00138                 // read number of dimensions
00139                 fread(&ndim, sizeof (int), 1, fp);
00140                 if (ndim > MAXDIMS) {
00141                         cerr << "load_matrix failed (" << filename << "): ";
00142                         cerr << " too many dimensions: " << ndim << " (MAXDIMS = " << MAXDIMS << ")." << endl;
00143                         return false;
00144                 }
00145         }
00146         else if (magic_vincent == get_magic_vincent<T>()) {
00147                 ndim_min = ndim;
00148         }
00149         if (ndim != m.order()) {
00150                 cerr << "load_matrix failed (" << filename << "): ";
00151                 cerr << "expected order of " << m.order() << " but found ";
00152                 cerr << ndim << " in file." << endl;
00153                 return false;
00154         }
00155 
00156         dims = (intg *) malloc(ndim * sizeof (intg));
00157         // header: read each dimension
00158         for (int i = 0; (i < ndim) || (i < ndim_min); ++i) {
00159                 fread(&v, sizeof (int), 1, fp);
00160                 if (magic_vincent == get_magic_vincent<T>())
00161                         v = endian(v);
00162                 if (i < ndim) {
00163                         dims[i] = v;
00164                         if (v <= 0) {
00165                                 cerr << "load_matrix failed (" << filename << "): ";
00166                                 cerr << " dimension is negative or 0." << endl;
00167                                 free(dims);
00168                                 return false;
00169                         }
00170                 }
00171         }
00172         // TODO: implement Idx constructor accepting array of dimensions and modify code below.
00173         m.resize(0 < ndim ? dims[0] : -1,
00174                           1 < ndim ? dims[1] : -1,
00175                                 2 < ndim ? dims[2] : -1,
00176                                 3 < ndim ? dims[3] : -1,
00177                                 4 < ndim ? dims[4] : -1,
00178                                 5 < ndim ? dims[5] : -1,
00179                                 6 < ndim ? dims[6] : -1,
00180                                 7 < ndim ? dims[7] : -1);
00181         // body
00182         { idx_aloop1(i, m, T) fread(&(*i), sizeof (T), 1, fp); }
00183         fclose(fp);
00184         free(dims);
00185         return true;
00186 }
00187 
00188 template<typename T> bool load_matrix(Idx<T>& m, istream &stream) {
00189 
00190         int magic, ndim, v;
00191         int ndim_min = 3; // the standard header requires at least 3 dimensions even empty ones.
00192         intg *dims = NULL;
00193 
00194         // header: read magic number
00195         stream.read((char*)&magic, sizeof (int));
00196         int magic_vincent = endian(magic);
00197         ndim = endian(magic) & 0xF;
00198         magic_vincent &= ~0xF;
00199         if ((magic != get_magic<T>()) && (magic_vincent != get_magic_vincent<T>())) {
00200                 cerr << "load_matrix failed : ";
00201                 cerr << get_magic_str(get_magic<T>()) << " expected, ";
00202                 cerr << get_magic_str(magic) << " found." << endl;
00203                 return false;
00204         }
00205         // standard header
00206         if (magic == get_magic<T>()) {
00207                 // read number of dimensions
00208                 stream.read((char*)&ndim, sizeof (int));
00209                 if (ndim > MAXDIMS) {
00210                         cerr << "load_matrix failed : ";
00211                         cerr << " too many dimensions: " << ndim << " (MAXDIMS = " << MAXDIMS << ")." << endl;
00212                         return false;
00213                 }
00214         }
00215         else if (magic_vincent == get_magic_vincent<T>()) {
00216                 ndim_min = ndim;
00217         }
00218         if (ndim != m.order()) {
00219                 cerr << "load_matrix failed : ";
00220                 cerr << "expected order of " << m.order() << " but found ";
00221                 cerr << ndim << " in file." << endl;
00222                 return false;
00223         }
00224 
00225         dims = (intg *) malloc(ndim * sizeof (intg));
00226         // header: read each dimension
00227         for (int i = 0; (i < ndim) || (i < ndim_min); ++i) {
00228                 stream.read((char*)&v, sizeof (int));
00229                 if (magic_vincent == get_magic_vincent<T>())
00230                         v = endian(v);
00231                 if (i < ndim) {
00232                         dims[i] = v;
00233                         if (v <= 0) {
00234                                 cerr << "load_matrix failed : ";
00235                                 cerr << " dimension is negative or 0." << endl;
00236                                 free(dims);
00237                                 return false;
00238                         }
00239                 }
00240         }
00241         // TODO: implement Idx constructor accepting array of dimensions and modify code below.
00242         m.resize(0 < ndim ? dims[0] : -1,
00243                           1 < ndim ? dims[1] : -1,
00244                                 2 < ndim ? dims[2] : -1,
00245                                 3 < ndim ? dims[3] : -1,
00246                                 4 < ndim ? dims[4] : -1,
00247                                 5 < ndim ? dims[5] : -1,
00248                                 6 < ndim ? dims[6] : -1,
00249                                 7 < ndim ? dims[7] : -1);
00250         // body
00251         { idx_aloop1(i, m, T) stream.read((char*)&(*i), sizeof (T)); }
00252         free(dims);
00253         return true;
00254 }

00256 // TODO: intg support
00257 // TODO: use c++ IO to catch IO exceptions more easily
00258 template<typename T> bool save_matrix(Idx<T>& m, const char *filename) {
00259         int v, i;
00260         FILE *fp = fopen(filename, "wb");
00261 
00262         if (!fp) {
00263                 cerr << "save_matrix failed (" << filename << ")." << endl;
00264                 return false;
00265         }
00266         // header
00267         v = get_magic<T>();
00268         fwrite(&v, sizeof (int), 1, fp);
00269         v = m.order();
00270         fwrite(&v, sizeof (int), 1, fp);
00271         for (i = 0; (i < m.order()) || (i < 3); ++i) {
00272                 if (i < m.order())
00273                         v = m.dim(i);
00274                 else
00275                         v = 1;
00276                 fwrite(&v, sizeof (int), 1, fp);
00277         }
00278         // body
00279         { idx_aloop1(i, m, T) fwrite(&(*i), sizeof (T), 1, fp); }
00280         fclose(fp);
00281         return true;
00282 }
00283 
00284 template<typename T> bool save_matrix(Idx<T>& m, ostream &stream) {
00285         int v, i;
00286 
00287         // header
00288         v = get_magic<T>();
00289         stream.write((char*)&v, sizeof (int));
00290         v = m.order();
00291         stream.write((char*)&v, sizeof (int));
00292         for (i = 0; (i < m.order()) || (i < 3); ++i) {
00293                 if (i < m.order())
00294                         v = m.dim(i);
00295                 else
00296                         v = 1;
00297                 stream.write((char*)&v, sizeof (int));
00298         }
00299         // body
00300         { idx_aloop1(i, m, T) stream.write((char*)&(*i), sizeof (T)); }
00301         return true;
00302 }
